From the manufacturer

Gold Bond Ultimate Healing – Stand Up for Your Skin

Hand Cream

Dry or rough hands? Put an end to it with Gold Bond Healing Hand Cream.

It’s formulated with soothing aloe, plus 7 intense moisturizers and 3 essential vitamins to give hands the deep moisture they need. This hand cream even lasts through handwashing.

Body Lotion

Introducing the rich hydration your skin’s been waiting for: Gold Bond Healing Lotion.

This Gold Bond lotion delivers intense hydration that lasts for 24 hours. Best of all, the nongreasy formula absorbs quickly.

Foot Cream

Kick your heels up! Gold Bond Healing Foot Cream intensely moisturizes dry, tough feet.

The deep moisturizing formula is made with 7 intense moisturizers and 3 essential vitamins to make dry, rough heels soft and smooth.

Your Triple Threat for Nourishing Dry, Rough Skin

24 Hour Moisture

Gold Bond Healing products are made with a blend of hydrating ingredients that draw moisture throughout the day to give you 24 hours of nourishing moisture.

Nourishing Ingredients

Every Gold Bond Healing formula is made with a triple vitamin blend that includes vitamin B to help improve the appearance of skin, vitamin C to protect against environmental stressors and vitamin E to help minimize moisture loss.

Soothing Aloe

Dry, rough skin can feel uncomfortable. That’s why Gold Bond Healing Lotion, Hand Cream, and Foot Cream contain aloe to soothe and hydrate skin.

Product Description

You're washing your hands a lot these days. Protect them with Gold Bond Ultimate Healing Hand Cream. Formulated with 7 intensive moisturizers, plus vitamins A, C and E, this hand cream nourishes as it repairs dry, problem skin. Gold Bond Hand Cream absorbs quickly and is non-greasy. It even lasts through handwashing because it adds a protective layer of moisture every time you use it. Best of all, this hand cream is hypoallergenic, making it suitable for all skin types. Gold Bond Ultimate Healing Hand Cream is also dermatologist tested. Stock up on 3-oz. tubes of Gold Bond Healing Hand Cream so you always have nourishing moisture on hand. Keep one on your desk, by your night stand, or in your bag.

How customer reviews and ratings work

Customer Reviews, including Product Star Ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them.

To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness.

5 out of 5 stars
How Good is it For the Dry Hands?
We all wash our hands often, and after recent events, perhaps even more frequently. This can lead to dryness and cracking of the skin on our hands, not to mention the fact that hands can become dry for a variety of other reasons. I needed a cream that would not only protect my skin throughout the day, even after repeated handwashing, but also restore and nourish it. Since I’m often on the go, I needed a portable option.Gold Bond Healing Hand Cream with Aloe comes in a small 3-ounce tube, which is about 85 grams, making it convenient to carry in a handbag. According to the manufacturer, the cream contains seven moisturizers and three vitamins, which should provide full nourishment and hydration for the skin. I haven’t tested it in a lab, but there is probably a significant amount of aloe in it, as the cream does have a healing and soothing effect on my hands — just like aloe is known for.The effect of the cream was noticeable almost immediately. Despite its thick consistency, it spreads easily and absorbs quickly. It doesn’t leave any greasy residue or stickiness, which is very convenient when you need to get back to your tasks quickly. Even after a few hours, my skin remains soft and moisturized, so the cream has a long-lasting effect.Gold Bond Healing Hand Cream is a reliable product for those looking for effective hydration and protection for dry hands.

5.0 out of 5 stars How Good is it For the Dry Hands?
Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2024
Size: 3 Ounce (Pack of 1)Verified Purchase
We all wash our hands often, and after recent events, perhaps even more frequently. This can lead to dryness and cracking of the skin on our hands, not to mention the fact that hands can become dry for a variety of other reasons. I needed a cream that would not only protect my skin throughout the day, even after repeated handwashing, but also restore and nourish it. Since I’m often on the go, I needed a portable option.

Gold Bond Healing Hand Cream with Aloe comes in a small 3-ounce tube, which is about 85 grams, making it convenient to carry in a handbag. According to the manufacturer, the cream contains seven moisturizers and three vitamins, which should provide full nourishment and hydration for the skin. I haven’t tested it in a lab, but there is probably a significant amount of aloe in it, as the cream does have a healing and soothing effect on my hands — just like aloe is known for.

The effect of the cream was noticeable almost immediately. Despite its thick consistency, it spreads easily and absorbs quickly. It doesn’t leave any greasy residue or stickiness, which is very convenient when you need to get back to your tasks quickly. Even after a few hours, my skin remains soft and moisturized, so the cream has a long-lasting effect.

Gold Bond Healing Hand Cream is a reliable product for those looking for effective hydration and protection for dry hands.
